website_summaries.verdict: Aside from minor sizing quirks, these Nike slide sandals are the perfect summer shoe for walking, playing, or to complete a cute, casual summery outfit.
pros: Supportive yet comfortable foam foot bed
Airy construction suited for hot days
Easy-to-wear slides are an essential summertime shoe
cons: These slides run large and may require you to select a half- or even an whole-size smaller than you usually wear

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy the womens, buy the MENS version of the shoe!! Trust me
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why the sole is so different between the womens and mens version of this shoe. The mens version is outrageously soft and easy to spend all day in while the "womens" version I purchased and just recently received is like any other regular shoe. Went ahead and bought the mens version again and it's Super soft, again. . . Strange inconsistencies
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: So so comfortable but remember to order a whole size down
customer_reviews.text: I did wind up getting these just not through amazon since they were sold out of my size. So so comfortable but remember to order a whole size down. I usually take an 8 which i tried but were way too big,needed a 7-perfect fit. So comfortable i even wear them as slippers in the house
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. I'm a 7.5 normally but I got a 7 and they fit perfect. This is my 5th pair(they dont ware out fast, my dog just keeps eating them or I lose them tubing on the river) my pink pair I've had for 4 years and their still good as new. Super easy to clean. They are extremely comfortable, the other slides give me blisters on top of my feet and the memory foam in these makes it so that doesnt happen.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable Sandals
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are very comfortable. The material used on the foot/sole part feels very plush but at the same time supportive. I like that there is cushioning underneath the top strap of the sandal. I usually wear a size 6 - 6.5 in Nike shoes. I bought a size 6 and they are a tiny bit larger than expected but I also have a narrow/petite foot. My feet are quickly soothed/relaxed when I put these sandals on after a long day at work. Totally worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I live in these shoes all year long so when it was time to order another pair, I was happy to still find them available on Amazon. My last pair was a little big so I ordered the next size down and the new pair fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: tricia

customer_reviews.title: Cure for sore feet
customer_reviews.text: By far the most comfortable slide sandal I've ever owned!! I'm plus size and use these as house slippers and my feet are not sore at the end of the day anymore! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: NRP23

customer_reviews.title: Noisey
customer_reviews.text: They started off very nice however after only a few months they squeak so bad when you walk. I want to throw them away. if you don't mind the loud squeaking sound, get them. They're extremely comfortable just too dang noisy.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Barrett-sparrow

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy. I originally bought the regular women’s Nike slides in a size 9, my normal shoe size, and they were way too small. I bought these in a size 9 and they fit perfect. A little loose, but I think an 8 would be too small.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen K.

customer_reviews.title: I love them ! So comfy
customer_reviews.text: Don't listen to the bad reviews . They are perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and great vendor. Even less price than shown. Runs about a size large (unless maybe you have VERY wide feet . Had to return for one size smaller but now fits great.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence B.

customer_reviews.title: So soft and comfortable. Ordered these a size larger so if my ...
customer_reviews.text: So soft and comfortable. Ordered these a size larger so if my feet swelled after having my baby I could still wear them. They were already a little large so I probably could have ordered them in my regular size. Still being. Large I’m able to wear them comfortably and would order again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: MLink

customer_reviews.title: Comforty
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes this is the second pair I own very comfortable. The only small complaint I have they get dirty quickly so be prepare to clean them all the time. I have put them in the washer and the shoes was not damage.
customer_reviews.author: Tippie

customer_reviews.title: Feel great
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift for my mom. She says they are a bit big on her but I’m sure sandals are supposed to fit like that. Very coushin-y, feel great.
customer_reviews.author: Cali boy

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I looked high and low to replace these slides. I love the look and the comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Nike slide sandal
customer_reviews.text: I do like the sandal, it is very comfortable. Nike needs to make shoes in 1/2 sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Cobban

customer_reviews.title: my favorite Nike Slide
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these NIke Slides. I am very particular and these sandals are very comfortable on my feet. I am sad that the only place I can find them is on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great support, love them
customer_reviews.text: After spending hundred of dollars on shoes for my plantar fasciitis, lo and behold these were the magic shoe!! I can't be without them. Very cushy, great support, love them!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: lvoe them just too big for my feet these run large in womens
customer_reviews.author: TAMMY NOVAK

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. They are very comfortable and easy to slip on. I’m thinking about purchasing another pair, because I like them so much!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My heel feel better
customer_reviews.text: Best shoe I own work very well if you have plantar fasciitis. I will order another pair.
customer_reviews.author: banner 1

customer_reviews.title: Comfy slides
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I both have these and love them. They are very comfy - haven't had them long enough to speak about the durability but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Psi 5

customer_reviews.title: Order a size down
customer_reviews.text: I love them. Very comfortable. I read the reviews and ordered a size down. I wear an 8 shoe and ordered these in a 7. Good thing because they would of been huge, they are a wide slip on
customer_reviews.author: Gayle

customer_reviews.title: SO SOFT
customer_reviews.text: These fit perfect, and are super comfy. The inside of the band is squishy and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Destiny R

customer_reviews.title: Soft!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy. Squishy. I would advise buying one size smaller than you normally wear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slide Nike
customer_reviews.text: If you have a wider foot go up one size
customer_reviews.author: S. Shockley

customer_reviews.title: Softness
customer_reviews.text: I have a pair of the solarsoft slides but in need of a new pair. These are nothing like I previously purchased
customer_reviews.author: mcarlyle

customer_reviews.title: So so comfy
customer_reviews.text: There’re pretty. There’re light. They’re really comfy. About 1/2 size too big.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: These shoes fit nicely and are very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit nicely and are very comfortable. I wear them a lot and plan on buying a pair in another color.
customer_reviews.author: sandie sparks

customer_reviews.title: Love these slides!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these slides!! Arch support for comfort and very sporty!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Christianson

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought these slides for my daughter. When she received them, she loved them. The fit and look, was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Tabztoy

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: They are a bit wide so your foot slides through to the end real easy Wish they made them in a true B width. They are comfortable !
customer_reviews.author: Gigi Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Sandals
customer_reviews.text: Excellent gift, the person loved this sandal. Durable and highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: I love these slides. They are the most comfortable sandal's I've ever purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Kessille L Gedye

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful! But a little big for my. I am size #8 and ordered this size. But they run big.
customer_reviews.author: Noreimi M.

customer_reviews.title: I am in love with these sandals
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with these sandals!!! They are incredibly confortable--- so much cushion!! I think they fit true to size!
customer_reviews.author: Chels

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it if you have a pair of sweaty feet
customer_reviews.text: same as title, the surface sticks very tight with my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Robin.H

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Don't wash very easy. Got something on the Nike swish and it stained immediately... Sucked
customer_reviews.author: darrell

customer_reviews.title: COMFY!!
customer_reviews.text: So comfy...I ordered the size 4 and wear a 6 1/2 in womens. PERFECT!! good soft arch support too
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A. Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable slide
customer_reviews.text: Great fit nice and very very comfortable . highly recommended if looking for comfort and durability
customer_reviews.author: Marie Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Emy
customer_reviews.text: These were just what I expected, if not more. The only mistake was on me I ordered a sz 10 and needed a 9. Love them though.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Smith

customer_reviews.title: I'm so glad to have this I wish I selected the right ...
customer_reviews.text: I finally found the sleepers what I was looking with my Plantar fasciitis problem . I'm so glad to have this I wish I selected the right size I chose 7 and it's a bit loose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very comfy! not completely waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: super comfy! I thought they were fully waterproof but there is some fabric that is not. still use them in the gym shower though.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Natividad

customer_reviews.title: I normally wear size 6. 5 but this time ...
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear size 6.5 but this time I purchased the sandals in size 6. Still a size larger than what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Vivz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes the color was right they fit just like they should very comfortable the phone
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoes but,they r a little bit to big
customer_reviews.author: Donna Lawson

customer_reviews.title: GET THEM
customer_reviews.text: if you are on your feet all i would get these because they are super comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: ... Henri so that I can use the slide and enjoy the comfort
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these to much because they are so soft that he chews them requiring me to buy multiple pairs that are now hidden from Henri so that I can use the slide and enjoy the comfort. I give these a great rating.. However, they are not chew sticks for dogs... so hide them it you have a puppy as they are too enticing for their little teeth!
customer_reviews.author: Charmed1

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Well not really small but kind of tight. Otherwise great shoe
customer_reviews.author: Karin

customer_reviews.title: Soft liner on strap SMELLS!
customer_reviews.text: Have used these at pool where, of course, they get slightly wet from wet feet. They walk well but take days for that soft underside of strap to dry and STINK up my closet or locker. If ONLY using dry they are fine but even slightly wet and people start telling you that you need a shower!,, not happy
customer_reviews.author: A. Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: I Love these sandals! They are the most comfortable pair of sandals I have ever owned
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Love them no problem fit as expect it very comfortable ...
customer_reviews.text: Love them no problem fit as expect it very comfortable can walk all day in this don't listen to all them complains I read reviews before buys I bout any ways there amazing 💯 my option I bout I give them a 5 star .
customer_reviews.author: gp

customer_reviews.title: Best sandals! Go Nike!
customer_reviews.text: The most confortable sandals I've ever owned. I know the name says "Womens" but by accident I bought it (Im a Men size 8) and surprisly enought they fit so well! Im so happy with this sandals, I can wear them all day, its also great to wear them after sports!
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Espinoza

customer_reviews.title: Buy today! You won't be disappointed! SO comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These slides are SO comfortable! Great material! Fits true to size! Adjustable width. Order these! You won't be disappointed !
customer_reviews.author: Kelly9158

customer_reviews.title: A very well-made, comfy and supportive slide
customer_reviews.text: These slides are so comfortable! I have two pair so when one pair gets wet, I can wear the other. They are great as shower shoes and for wearing after a long run or workout...I use them as my warm weather slippers, too.
customer_reviews.author: Chernow

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: comfortable good quality slides. The white gets dirty easy though, FYI
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable soccer slides!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my granddaughter to wear to soccer games. She loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Deb and Bill

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves them
customer_reviews.text: Size is a little big, but the wife loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Scott B.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Found them in a store, didn't have her size and found them on Amazon, perfect size and perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia's

customer_reviews.title: They are a lady friends, I bought as house ...
customer_reviews.text: They are a lady friends, I bought as house shoes for her. They where perfecter then being a little tight, but that's expected from Nike

customer_reviews.title: Much too big - order a size smaller to fit just right or better yet steer clear from this particular item
customer_reviews.text: I think these look very masculine on a woman. Much too big - order a size smaller to fit just right or better yet steer clear from this particular item. Again, I've order other Nike sandals and like those far better. A waste of my money on this item!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves them.
customer_reviews.text: Fit great & my daughter wears them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Jmcneese

product_meta.title: Nike Women's Benassi Solarsoft Slide Sandal
product_meta.description: The Women's NIKE Benassi Solarsoft Slide Sandal hooks you up with a stand-out fractal design on the footstrap for style and on the footbed for added comfort. The dual-density foam midsole is super soft and plush under your foot.
feature_bullets: Dual-density foam midsole is plush under your foot
Fractal designs enhance comfort and style
